mapper.sql: course_id, course_sum_id, course_name, description, course_time, course_type, course_path, is_local, occupation, application_level, sorted
mapper.insert: insert into course(course_id, course_sum_id, course_name, description, course_time, course_type, course_path, is_local, occupation, application_level, sorted) values(#{courseId}, #{courseSumId}, #{courseName}, #{description}, #{courseTime}, #{courseType}, #{coursePath}, #{isLocal}, #{occupation}, #{applicationLevel}, #{sorted})
mapper.update:
update course
course_id = #{courseId},
course_sum_id = #{courseSumId},
course_name = #{courseName},
description = #{description},
course_time = #{courseTime},
course_type = #{courseType},
course_path = #{coursePath},
is_local = #{isLocal},
occupation = #{occupation},
application_level = #{applicationLevel},
sorted = #{sorted},
where course_id = #{courseId}
